content:
:wave: I opened a feature enhancement issue to discuss adding debug symbol transformation for AArch64 last week. Should I be assigning anyone in particular to take a look at it? I have a PR that appears to work for a number of test cases I've tried but I'm not super familiar with the details of the transformation logic to assess how much of the existing is tied to x86_64 specific details.

Add debug symbol transformation for AArch64 路 Issue #4393 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Feature Debug symbol transformation for AArch64. That is, when running wasmtime compile -g <path_to_wasm>, wasmtime does not exit with an error message and debug symbols are included in the r...
Jeff Charles has marked this topic as resolved.
